description: Unhandled exception in coroutine crashes app. Exception propagation not properly managed.
commonCauses: Exception in launch without try-catch or handler
async exception not caught when await() called
Exception in child coroutine propagating to parent
SupervisorJob not used when child failure should be isolated
solutions: Use try-catch in coroutine body for expected exceptions
Use SupervisorJob for independent child failure handling
Use catch operator for Flow exceptions
prevention: Install CoroutineExceptionHandler in all custom scopes
Use SupervisorJob when children should fail independently
Use Flow.catch() for Flow error handling
Monitor crash reports for coroutine exceptions
examples: val handler = CoroutineExceptionHandler { _, e -> Log.e(TAG, "Error", e) }
viewModelScope.launch { try { riskyOperation() } catch (e: Exception) { handleError(e) } }
